entry.title: Welcome
entry.summary: Blog features are powered by the blog plugin. Simply add files to the blog directory. It supports tags as well!
entry.content:
Blog features are powered by the blog plugin. Simply add files to the blog directory. It supports tags as well!

Delete the whole directory if you don't want the blog features. As simple as that!

entry.title: Hello
entry.summary: Welcome to this blog. This blog is created with Docusaurus 2 alpha.
entry.content:
Welcome to this blog. This blog is created with Docusaurus 2 alpha.

This is a test post.

A whole bunch of other information.
